import React, { useState } from 'react' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Accordion from 'react-bootstrap/Accordion'; export var cartItems = new Array(); var item = {}; function Cards() { //categories const fashion = 'fashion' const tech = 'tech' const trending = 'trending' cartItems.push( { id: 1, inCart: 0, quantity: 0, category: fashion, image: , title: 'Nike Hat1', price: '$40', description: 'Personalized Comfort. The Nike Sportswear Pro adjustable cap sports a classic six-panel design and press-on back for a personalized fit and Comfort' }) const [products] = useState([ { id: 1, inCart: 0, quantity: 0, category: fashion, image: , title: 'Nike Hat1', price: '$40', description: 'Personalized Comfort. The Nike Sportswear Pro adjustable cap sports a classic six-panel design and press-on back for a personalized fit and Comfort' }, { id: 1, inCart: 0, quantity: 0, category: fashion, image: , title: 'Nike Hat2', price: '$40', description: 'Personalized Comfort. The Nike Sportswear Pro adjustable cap sports a classic six-panel design and press-on back for a personalized fit and Comfort' }, { id: 1, inCart: 0, quantity: 0, category: fashion, image: , title: 'Nike Hat3', price: '$40', description: 'Personalized Comfort. The Nike Sportswear Pro adjustable cap sports a classic six-panel design and press-on back for a personalized fit and Comfort' }, { id: 1, inCart: 0, quantity: 0, category: fashion, image: , title: 'Nike Hat4', price: '$40', description: 'Personalized Comfort. The Nike Sportswear Pro adjustable cap sports a classic six-panel design and press-on back for a personalized fit and Comfort' }, { id: 1, inCart: 0, quantity: 0, category: tech, image: , title: 'Nike Hat5', price: '$40', description: 'Personalized Comfort. The Nike Sportswear Pro adjustable cap sports a classic six-panel design and press-on back for a personalized fit and Comfort' }, { id: 1, inCart: 0, quantity: 0, category: tech, image: , title: 'Nike Hat6', price: '$40', description: 'Personalized Comfort. The Nike Sportswear Pro adjustable cap sports a classic six-panel design and press-on back for a personalized fit and Comfort' }, { id: 1, inCart: 0, quantity: 0, category: trending, image: , title: 'Nike Hat7', price: '$40', description: 'Personalized Comfort. The Nike Sportswear Pro adjustable cap sports a classic six-panel design and press-on back for a personalized fit and Comfort' }, { id: 1, inCart: 0, quantity: 0, category: trending, image: , title: 'Nike Hat8', price: '$40', description: 'Personalized Comfort. The Nike Sportswear Pro adjustable cap sports a classic six-panel design and press-on back for a personalized fit and Comfort' } ]); function inCart(product) { console.log(product.inCart + " before") product.inCart = 1 console.log(product.inCart + " after") } const fashionProd = [] const techProd = [] const trendingProd = [] products.map(prod => { if (prod.category === fashion) return fashionProd.push(prod) if (prod.category === tech) return techProd.push(prod) if (prod.category === trending) return trendingProd.push(prod) }) products.map(prod => { if (prod.inCart === 1) { item = prod return cartItems.push(item) } }) console.log(cartItems.length) useState(cartItems) return (

Fashion

{fashionProd.map((product) => ( {product.image} {product.title}

{product.price}

Description {product.description} ))}

{techProd.map((product) => ( {product.image} {product.title}

{product.price}

Description {product.description} ))}

Trending

{trendingProd.map((product) => ( {product.image} {product.title}

{product.price}

Description {product.description} ))}
); } export default Cards;
